bibl.title: Hazzard v. Aguirre and Price. Assignment of Errors.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness on behalf of defendants to answer the following question propounded by defendants' attorney,-

"Did you have any conversation with the members of the Grand Jury and the prosecuting witness in relation to the facts as to who George Hazzard was; and as to the person who is wanted on that indictment before leaving Los Angeles to come to Tacoma?"
Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness on behalf of the defendants to answer the question propounded by defendants' attorney.
"Go on and state what that conversation was?"
Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness on behalf of the defendants to testify as follows:

"Stevens told me who it was; told me it was this George Hazzard and told me before he left there what he was doing; told me was was Secretary of the County Democratic Central Committee in Tacoma just before I started.
Error of the Court in permitting the witness M.J. Aguirre to answer the following quesiton propounded by defendants; attorney?

"Can you state whether this defendant is the George Hazzard referred to and mentioned in the warrant of requisition and issued upon the authority of the requisition from the State of California who is wanted to answer the indictment upon which that requisition was based.
Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness
